skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Essence:</text> <text class='c_resource'>9</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>35%</text></br>Burst an enemy's blood, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.27 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Hemorrhage</text> has a <text class='c_number'>20%</text> chance to form a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

skills.name: Blood Surge
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>30</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>12%</text></br>Draw blood from enemies, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage, and expel a blood nova, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge's</text> nova damage is increased by <text class='c_number'>10%</text> per enemy drained, up to <text class='c_number'>50%</text>.

skills.name: Corpse Tendrils
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[11 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Veins burst out of a Corpse, Pulling in enemies, Stunning them for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds, and dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to them. Does not consume the Corpse.

skills.name: Bone Storm
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>60</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>[[(1-Pow(1-1.67/100, 30))*100]]%</text></br>A swirling storm of bones appears around you and your Golem, dealing <text class='c_number'>1.8</text> to surrounding enemies over <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds.

skills.name: Decrepify
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>10</text></br>Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> are Slowed by <text class='c_number'>[[1 - (Pow(1-(0.4), (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))))]*100]%</text> and deal <text class='c_number'>[[1 - (Pow(1-(0.2), 1 / (cdr[sLevel]))]*100]%</text> less damage for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds.

skills.name: Iron Maiden
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>[Mod.GainMana ? 0 : 10]</text></br>Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text> take <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage each time they deal direct damage. Lasts <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Aegis
base_affixes: +0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
added_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>2.01</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>45</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Doom Cuisses
base_affixes: You Heal for <text class='c_random'>0.03</text> Life per second for each Close enemy, up to <text class='c_number'>0.15</text> Life per second.

equipment.name: Ring
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge’s</text> nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing <text class='c_random'>75.56%</text> less damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Gauntlets
added_affixes: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> grants you <text class='c_number'>0.75%</text> bonus <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> damage on your next <text class='c_important'><u>Overpowering</u></text> attack, up to a <text class='c_random'>61.78%</text> bonus.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: Walking near a Corpse automatically activates an equipped <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> Skill every second, dealing <text class='c_random'>31%</text> reduced damage.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: After spending <text class='c_random'>152.61</text> of your Primary Resource, your next attack Stuns enemies hit for <text class='c_number'>1</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.71</text> seconds.
added_affixes: When there are at least <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> Close enemies, Stun them for <text class='c_random'>4.84</text> seconds. This can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>30</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Helm
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.41</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Necklace
base_affixes: +(2) Rank of the Tides of Blood Passive
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Sacrifice</text> bonuses are increased by <text class='c_random'>24.94%</text>.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: When at least <text class='c_number'>4</text> enemies are near you, gain an aura that automatically curses surrounding enemies with <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> for <text class='c_random'>11</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Circle
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>52.5</text> of your Primary Resource for every <text class='c_number'>37.5%</text> of your Life that you Heal.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>1.61</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>14</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>42</text> seconds.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.52%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>31.27%</text>.

equipment.name: Spinal Wand
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>40.13%</text> Attack Speed.
